    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        public static OAObjectKey getKey(OAObject oaObj)
        returns the OAObjectKey that uniquely represents this object.

      • getKey

        public static OAObjectKey getKey(OAObject oaObj,
                 java.lang.Object keyValue)
        Create a new key based on a certain value "keyValue". This is used to build the key if the Id property has already been changed in the object and the previous (oldValue) is known. Used by OAObjectEventDelegate.

      • setKey

        protected static void setKey(OAObject oaObj,
          OAObjectKey key)

      • updateKey

        protected static boolean updateKey(OAObject oaObj,
                boolean bVerify)
        Used to update Hubs and HubController when an objects unique values (property Id) are changed.
        Returns:
        true if HubController is updated
        See Also:
        OAObjectKey

      • verifyKeyChange
